eligibility.notes: In-app + 7-ELEVEN COD; opened ~15h after pickup; Order is not yet completed

snadResult.label: SNAD
snadResult.reason: The seller failed to disclose the screen replacement, which is a material mismatch between the listing and delivered item. The seller’s statement 'Genuine Apple Part – Display replaced' is misleading and lacks sufficient detail to establish a clear mismatch.

primaryOption.label: Return & Full Refund
primaryOption.details: Seller reimburses NT$60 COD shipping and provides a return label.

alternativeOption.label: Partial Refund & Keep Item
alternativeOption.details: Buyer keeps the item; offer 15–30% partial refund.

caseSummary:
Order: TW-10567
Eligibility: R1/R2/R3 ✅
Key: The seller failed to disclose the screen replacement, which is a material mismatch between the listing and delivered item. The seller’s statement 'Genuine Apple Part – Display replaced' is misleading and lacks sufficient detail to establish a clear mismatch.
Decision: SNAD
Outcome: The dispute was settled with the Seller issuing a full refund and return label.
